DOC.detailed_description: Background : Epidemiologic study suggest vegetable protein intake inversely relate blood pressure . Objectives : To examine effect soybean protein supplementation blood pressure person prehypertension stage-1 hypertension Design : Randomized , double-blind , control trial Study Participants : 300 participant , age 35-64 year , initial untreated systolic blood pressure 130-159 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure 80-99 mmHg Intervention : Study participant randomly assign take 40-grams isolated soybean protein supplement per day complex carbohydrate control 12 week . Outcomes : Blood pressure measurement obtain use random-zero sphygmomanometer baseline trial week 6 12 . Net change systolic diastolic blood pressure intervention primary outcome .
